description: Device owner — full access to all capabilities
notes: The primary user. Full trust. All QIE modules accessible.

description: Explicitly whitelisted contacts with verified identity
notes: Trusted collaborators. Can invoke most modules but not SoulOS or QI.

description: DM-paired contacts — verified via pairing code
notes: Verified but limited. Can use build and growth skills.

description: Recognized contacts — have interacted before but not paired
notes: Can chat but cannot invoke QIE modules. Prompt to pair.

description: Unknown contacts — first interaction or unrecognized
notes: Untrusted by default. Receive pairing invitation. Rate limited.
